name: SPACE WARS (NOKIA 3301 JAM 5)
description:
SPACE WARS is the ultimate space adventure video game.

How to Play


Plot

Far away, a long long time ago

It is a period of civil war. The Insurgency managed to steal secret plans to the Reign's ultimate weapon, the KILLER STAR, a space station with enough power to anihil an entire galaxy.

Your main objective is to find the pieces of the KILLER KILLER STAR, a missile created by The Insurgency to destroy the KILLER STAR. The pieces are in three diferent planets in the galaxy.

After you find all the pieces, you may go to the KILLER STAR and find out how to trespass the security ships.

Interface

Radar - Will spot your spaceship and the 3 planets of The Insurgency.

Shields - The shields are your health. If one enemy ship or one enemy bullet hit your ship, you'll lose 1 shield. 

KILLER KILLER STAR PIECES - Indicator of your pieces.

GAS - Amount of fuel you have. You'll lose if it becomes empty. 

Credits

Programming, Design by Thiago Yasue

Soundpack by Trix - "nokia 3310 soundpack 2023"
